data.rules:
Beat the game as fast as possible.  You must complete all of the following objectives in addition to killing Metal Kor:

• Collect all 286 precursor orbs (duped orbs do not count)
• Complete all missions and side missions
• Obtain all Dark Powers

All secrets are allowed to be activated.  Disc tray manipulation is banned.

A mission is deemed "completed" once its end trigger has been hit.  Start triggers do not count towards this definition.

Timing starts from the moment you gain control over Jak when starting a new game.  Timing ends the moment you have achieved all objectives (on the 286th orb pickup, attainment of the last Dark Power, etc.)

Debug mode isn't allowed.

zqojwdp1.label: Original
zqojwdp1.rules:
Original black or red label on PS2
Original black or red label on PS3

013xe3d1.label: HD Collection
013xe3d1.rules:
HD Collection on PS3
HD Collection on PSVita

** NOTE ON VITA **
There is a glitch on Vita where you can toggle secrets on (infinite ammo, invulnerability, and infinite dark jak) before having the required orbs or finishing the game.  

This glitch is not allowed to be used in runs as you should never be able to use these secrets prior to killing kor (or collecting the orbs).  In a run such as 100%, these secrets can be used prior to completing the game and getting the required number of orbs as expected on all other versions.

p125me71.label: 2017 Release
p125me71.rules: Emulated PS2 Classics release on PS4

21g2e7ml.label: Gunless
21g2e7ml.rules:
Beat the game as fast as possible.  No restrictions on glitches, skips, etc. Disc tray manipulation is banned.

Firing guns during this run is not allowed. This includes all four morph gun mods, the guns on Krimzon Guard vehicles, and turrets. Causing enemies to fire their own guns at one another is permitted. Drawing your weapon but not firing it is also permitted.

You are allowed to make and load saves, as long as you only load saves created during the run. If you accidentally fire a weapon, you may load back to a previous save from the run to negate it.

Timing starts from the moment you gain control over Jak when starting a new game.  Timing ends when you get the final hit on Metal Kor.

Debug mode isn't allowed.

5q8d2pkl.label: Debug Any%
5q8d2pkl.rules:
Beat the game as fast as possible.  No restrictions on glitches, skips, etc. Disc tray manipulation is banned.

Timing starts from the moment you gain control over Jak when starting a new game.  Timing ends when the game is finished (ex: getting the final hit on Metal Kor or getting control when the game is in a finished state)  If timing does not end of the final hit, then you must also include in your video proof that all missions (except oracle missions) are completed in the mission log.

Debug mode IS allowed.

https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/183602500375543808/419606914909995008/unknown.png

gq7rnpyl.label: Developer Picture
gq7rnpyl.rules:
Find a Developer picture as fast as possible

Timing starts from the moment you gain control over Jak when starting a new game.  Timing ends when you zoom on the developer picture

Debug mode isn't allowed.

4lxeyw41.label: Ashelin Stalker
4lxeyw41.rules:
Beat the game as fast as possible.  No restrictions on glitches, skips, etc. Disc tray manipulation is banned.

This run use the "Full ng+" file setup.  You're allowed to use debug to give yourself every items prior to starting the run, save that at the start of the game as your run file then remove debug before starting runs.

You HAVE to trigger every Ashelin cutscene in the game. You don't have to watch them fully.
Here's the list of cutscenes you have to trigger :
Act 1
-Meeting Ashelin
-Daxter Has His Move
Act 2
-Sneak Attack!
-Ashelin is Worried
-The Cat Fight
Act 3
-Oh Well...
-Ashelin Drops Jak Off
-Stone...Gun...Nest!

Timing starts from the moment you gain control over Jak when loading the full ng+ file. Timing ends when you get the final hit on Metal Kor.

21d32zpq.label: All Missions Act 1
21d32zpq.rules:
You must complete all of the missions in act 1 defined by the game in the Level Select Menu (e.g. http://i.imgur.com/4RvK2zL.png). Disc tray manipulation is banned

A mission is deemed "completed" once it's end trigger has been hit. Start triggers do not count towards this definition.

Timing starts from the moment you gain control over Jak when starting a new game. Timing ends when you get the cutscene at the end of "Protect site in Dead Town".

Debug mode isn't allowed.

4lx309rl.label: Mirrored any%
4lx309rl.rules:
Beat the game as fast as possible in mirrored mode. No restrictions on glitches, skips etc.
Debug is only to be used when setting up mirrored mode, it must be turned off before the run begins.
The hoverboard and red/yellow/blue guns cannot be used until after the Daxter sequence in Mar's Tomb.
The Peacemaker cannot be used until after collecting it in the gun course during the run.

Setup:
Select a new file with debug already turned on, pause instantly before moving Jak and press L3 + X on a second controller to unlock all secrets. Then turn on mirrored mode in the secrets menu, before turning off debug. You are ready to run.

Timing:
Timing starts when you unpause and gain control of Jak, with the timer starting at 0.
Timing ends after the last hit on Kor.

Other Rules:
Using any method to visually flip your gameplay/game capture is not allowed.
Disc tray manipulation is banned.

run.comment: First 5 lap skips in a row, ive gotten dozens of 4s but this is the first 5th.

data.name: NYFE-Race Class 2
data.rules: Uses in game time defined in the hi-scores menu / the ending screen (not the one in the corner of the screen)

data.name: Erol Race
data.rules: Uses in game time defined in the hi-scores menu / the ending screen (not the one in the corner of the screen)

data.name: Port Race
data.rules: Uses in game time defined in the hi-scores menu / the ending screen (not the one in the corner of the screen)

data.name: Catch Scouts in Haven Forest
data.rules: Timing begins on first frame of movement starting from the respawn point near the platform, and ends on killing the last scout (first frame of counter being 0).

data.name: Destroy Equipment at Dig Site
data.rules: Timing begins on the first frame of movement starting from the spawn point in the dig, and ends on the first black frame of the ending cutscene.

data.name: Lifeseed Ghosttown
data.rules: Timing begins on skipping the lifeseed cutscene and ends on the first black frame before the onin cutscene.

data.name: Blow up Strip Mine Eco Wells
data.rules: Timing begins on first frame of timer appearing, and ends on the first black frame before the ending cutscene.

data.name: Any% All Orbs
data.rules:
Beat the game as fast as possible.  You must collect all 286 precursor orbs (duped orbs do not count).  All secrets are allowed to be activated.  No additional restrictions.  Disc tray manipulation is banned.

Timing starts from the moment you gain control over Jak when starting a new game.  Timing ends when you get the final orb or the final hit on kor, whatever comes first.

Debug mode isn't allowed.

data.name: Any% Hoverless
data.rules:
Beat the game as fast as possible without the use of the "Infinite Hover Glitch". Disc tray manipulation is banned.

The Infinite Hover Glitch is defined as performing two L1 tricks in a single jetboard jump.

Timing starts from the moment you gain control over Jak when starting a new game. Timing ends when you get the final hit on Metal Kor.

Debug mode isn't allowed.
